Sentencas: The use of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) is a promising approach towards achieving sustainable electricity production from fuel.
Titulo: Towards online optimisation of solid oxide fuel cell performance: Combining deep learning with multi-physics simulation

Sentencas: The utilisation of the hydrocarbons and biomass in SOFCs is particularly attractive owing to their wide distribution, high energy density, and low price.
Titulo: Towards online optimisation of solid oxide fuel cell performance: Combining deep learning with multi-physics simulation

Sentencas: The long-term operation of SOFCs using such fuels remains difficult owing to a lack of an effective diagnosis and optimisation system, which requires not only a precise analysis but also a fast response.
Titulo: Towards online optimisation of solid oxide fuel cell performance: Combining deep learning with multi-physics simulation

Sentencas: In this study, we developed a hybrid model for an on-line analysis of SOFCs at the cell level.
Titulo: Towards online optimisation of solid oxide fuel cell performance: Combining deep learning with multi-physics simulation

Sentencas: The model combines a multi-physics simulation (MPS) and deep learning, overcoming the complexity of MPS for a model-based control system, and reducing the cost of building a database (compared with the experiments) for the training of a deep neural network.
Titulo: Towards online optimisation of solid oxide fuel cell performance: Combining deep learning with multi-physics simulation

Sentencas: The maximum temperature gradient and heat generation are two target parameters for an efficient operation of SOFCs.
Titulo: Towards online optimisation of solid oxide fuel cell performance: Combining deep learning with multi-physics simulation

Sentencas: The results show that a precise prediction can be achieved from a trained AI algorithm, in which the relative error between the MPS and AI models is less than 1%.
Titulo: Towards online optimisation of solid oxide fuel cell performance: Combining deep learning with multi-physics simulation

Sentencas: Moreover, an online optimisation is realised using a genetic algorithm, achieving the maximum power density within the limitations of the temperature gradient and operating conditions.
Titulo: Towards online optimisation of solid oxide fuel cell performance: Combining deep learning with multi-physics simulation

Sentencas: This method can also be applied to the prediction and optimisation of other non-liner, dynamic systems.
Titulo: Towards online optimisation of solid oxide fuel cell performance: Combining deep learning with multi-physics simulation
